abstract: This report presents an analysis of the data from Statistics Canada on the population of obesed people in Canada. This analysis focuses on the variables, suhc as States, Gender and Age in relation with Body Mass Index (BMI). The analysis is consisted of logistic regression performed with the statistical programming language R. The result we obtained from the paper will increase the awareness of obesity for certain groups of people,who have higher risk of being obesed. Morever, it can contribute to the development of medical solution for people who are suffering from obesity.
